name: Date Caramel Maple Pecan Granola
description: This Date Caramel Maple Pecan Granola is lightly sweet and perfect for any time. Pecans, Oats, coconut, pumpkin and chia seeds and dried blueberries tossed in date caramel and baked to perfection. Vegan Glutenfree Soyfree Recipe. Can be nutfree. Makes a 16 oz mason jar worth

video.name: VEGAN DATE CARAMEL MAPLE PECAN GRANOLA Gluten-free | Vegan Richa Recipes
video.description:
This Date Caramel Maple Pecan Granola is a lightly sweet Superfood granola. Easily Oilfree.
FULL RECIPE: https://www.veganricha.com/2018/12/date-caramel-maple-pecan-granola.html
Indian Kitchen Cookbook: https://www.veganricha.com/vegan-richas-indian-kitchen-cookbook
Everyday Kitchen Cookbook: https://www.veganricha.com/vegan-richas-everyday-kitchen

Pecans, Oats, coconut, pumpkin and chia seeds and dried blueberries tossed in date caramel and baked to perfection. Vegan Glutenfree Soyfree Recipe. Can be nutfree.
Whenever Iâ€™ve tried store bought granola, it usually ends up being a bit too sweet. So this is just the right sweet for me. You can adjust based on your preference. Add a bit more sweetener or add more dried fruit if you like. 

The granola takes a few minutes to put together. It can be made oil-free and also nut-free. Use a combination of seeds instead of the pecans. 

Music: by Lakey Inspired
soundcloud.com/lakeyinspired

Follow:
My blog: https://veganricha.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/VeganRicha
Instagram: https://instagram.com/veganricha
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/veganricha
Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/veganricha/

recipeIngredient: 12  soft dates (, soaked in warm water for atleast a half hour)
2 tbsp maple syrup (, 4 tbsp for sweeter)
1 tbsp oil (, coconut or neutral (or omit for oilfree and 1 tbsp more maple syrup))
1/4 cup non dairy milk ( or reserved soaking water from the dates)
1 tsp cinnamon or pumpkin pie spice
1.5 cups old fashioned oats ((certified glutenfree if needed), or use puffed glutenfree grains)
1/2 cup pecans (, heaping cup, a mix of chopped and halfs)
1/4 cup pumpkin seeds (, or other seeds or nuts such as cashews)
1/2 to 3/4 cup dried blueberries (, or chopped dates or other dried fruit)

recipeInstructions.text: Line a baking dish with parchment. Preheat the oven to 275 deg F (135 C). Drain the dates (reserve soaking water) and blend with the maple syrup, oil, 1/4 cup milk/soaking water, salt, cinnamon, and 1 tbsp shredded coconut, until smooth. (Add another tbsp of soaking water to help with the blending if needed).
recipeInstructions.name: Line a baking dish with parchment. Preheat the oven to 275 deg F (135 C). Drain the dates (reserve soaking water) and blend with the maple syrup, oil, 1/4 cup milk/soaking water, salt, cinnamon, and 1 tbsp shredded coconut, until smooth. (Add another tbsp of soaking water to help with the blending if needed).

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine the oats, coconut, pecans, pumpkin seeds, flax and chia. You can also add 1/4 cup more of chopped nuts or seeds of choice.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, combine the oats, coconut, pecans, pumpkin seeds, flax and chia. You can also add 1/4 cup more of chopped nuts or seeds of choice.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the blended date mixture and mix well until all the dry ingredients are coated. Sprinkle a good pinch of salt on the mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the blended date mixture and mix well until all the dry ingredients are coated. Sprinkle a good pinch of salt on the mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer to parchment lined baking sheet or dish. Bake at 275 degrees F for 35 mins, then turn the tray around. Move the granola after 15 mins and then continue to bake for another 20 mins or until crisp. (total 65 to 75 mins)
recipeInstructions.name: Transfer to parchment lined baking sheet or dish. Bake at 275 degrees F for 35 mins, then turn the tray around. Move the granola after 15 mins and then continue to bake for another 20 mins or until crisp. (total 65 to 75 mins)

recipeInstructions.text: Cool for 5 mins, then mix in dried fruit of choice. Cool completely before storing. Store in airtight glass container for upto a month. Serve over breakfast oats, chia pudding, yogurt, smoothie bowls etc
recipeInstructions.name: Cool for 5 mins, then mix in dried fruit of choice. Cool completely before storing. Store in airtight glass container for upto a month. Serve over breakfast oats, chia pudding, yogurt, smoothie bowls etc

keywords: date caramel granola, date sweetened granola, maple pecan granola, superfood granola
